item.title: Trail Year
item.description: A year ago I did my first trail run and wrote my first trail inspired post. Little did I know of the adventures that were about to unfold. Since then, I’ve not only ran my longest distance in one day (50 miles), I’ve also grown comfortable running ultras. I think that’s wild considering that the half marathon used to be my stretch distance. On reflecting on the wild year, I’d like to share some lessons I learnt.
